description: This policy works by defining what host namespaces can be used by a Pod. `allow_host_ipc`, `allow_host_network` and `allow_host_pid` are `false` by default. `allow_host_ports` is an empty list by default. This means that by default host IPC, network, pid and all host ports are disabled when this policy is loaded with no configuration.

tooltip: Allows the pod to set .spec.HostIPC to true.
label: Allow host IPC

tooltip: Allows the pod to set .spec.HostNetwork to true.
label: Allow host network

tooltip: Allows the pod to set .spec.HostPID to true.
label: Allow host PID

description: A range of ports to allow, an example would allow host ports `80`, `443` and the range `8000-9000`.
label: Allow host ports
